local_intent: Move above the computed push pose for the T-block and confirm the approach position is reached.
assumptions: push_pose has been computed by ComputeGraspPose and is available on the blackboard
TCP yaw has been set previously to 180 degrees
coherence_with_global: Implements the MoveAbove step using the precomputed push_pose after perception, consistent with the global sequence preceding ApproachAndAlign.
